lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : BIRGISSON, ARNTHOR/KOTECHA, SAVAN/YACOUB, RAMI
[00:11.060]Baby life was good to me
[00:13.420]But you just made it better
[00:21.730]I love the way you stand by me
[00:24.410]Throught any kind of weather
[00:31.400]I dont wanna run away
[00:34.390]Just wanna make your day
[00:37.800]When you fell the world is on your shoulders
[00:42.710]Dont wanna make it worse
[00:45.410]Just wanna make us work
[00:48.870]Baby tell me i will do whatever
[00:53.020]It feels like nobody ever knew me until you knew me
[00:53.520]It feels like nobody ever knew me until you knew me
[00:59.900]Feels like nobody ever loved me until you loved me
[01:05.360]Feels like nobody ever touched me until you touched me
[01:10.890]Baby nobody, nobody,until you
[01:18.100]Baby it just took one hit of you now I'm addicted
[01:22.740]Baby it just took one hit of you now I'm addicted
[01:34.940]You never know what's missing
[01:37.150]Till you get everything you need,yeah
[01:44.670]I don't wanna run away
[01:47.540]Just wanna make your day
[01:50.990]When you feel the world is on your shoulders
[01:55.790]Don't wanna make it worse
[01:58.670]Just wanna make us work
[02:02.090]Baby tell me,I'll do whatever
[02:06.640]It feels like nobody ever knew me until you knew me
[02:06.900]It feels like nobody ever knew me until you knew me
[02:13.100]Feels like nobody ever loved me until you loved me
[02:18.510]Feels like nobody ever touched me until you touched me
[02:24.220]Baby,nobody,nobody until you
[02:32.720]See it was enough to no
[02:36.910]See it was enough to no
[02:39.700]If I ever let you go
[02:43.400]I would be no one
[02:48.090]Cos I never thought I'd feel all the things you made me feel
[02:54.030]Wasn't looking for someone until you
[03:03.880]It feels like nobody ever knew me until you knew me
[03:04.700]It feels like nobody ever knew me until you knew me
[03:11.040]Feels like nobody ever loved me until you loved me
[03:16.530]Feels like nobody ever touched me until you touched me
[03:22.110]Baby,nobody,nobody
[03:26.060]It feels like nobody ever knew me until you knew me
[03:26.700]It feels like nobody ever knew me until you knew me
[03:33.150]Feels like nobody ever loved me until you loved me
[03:38.830]Feels like nobody ever touched me until you touched me
[03:44.130]Baby,nobody,nobody
[03:50.790]Nobody,nobody,until you
tlyric:
[00:11.060]宝贝.生命一向待我不薄
[00:13.420]但你让它更加美好
[00:21.730]我喜欢有你相伴.
[00:24.410]陪我渡过风风雨雨. 
[00:31.400]我不想逃离
[00:34.390]只想让你幸福
[00:37.800]当你感到肩负世间重担
[00:42.710]我不会把它变更糟
[00:45.410]只希望我们能在一起
[00:48.870]宝贝.告诉我.任何事情我都会为你做
[00:53.020]没有人像你那样了解我
[00:53.520]没有人像你那样了解我
[00:59.900]没有人像你那样爱我
[01:05.360]没有人像你那样感动我
[01:10.890]宝贝.没有人.没有人...直到遇见你!
[01:18.100]宝贝.一遇见你.我就沉溺其中
[01:22.740]宝贝.一遇见你.我就沉溺其中
[01:34.940]不曾拥有
[01:37.150]就不会知道失去
[01:44.670]我不想逃离
[01:47.540]只想让你幸福
[01:50.990]当你感到肩负世间重担
[01:55.790]我不会把它变更糟
[01:58.670]只希望我们能在一起
[02:02.090]宝贝.告诉我.任何事情我都会为你做
[02:06.640]没有人像你那样了解我
[02:06.900]没有人像你那样了解我
[02:13.100]没有人像你那样爱我
[02:18.510]没有人像你那样感动我
[02:24.220]宝贝.没有人.没有人...直到遇见你!
[02:32.720]看吧.显而易见
[02:36.910]看吧.显而易见
[02:39.700]离开了你
[02:43.400]我将不复存在
[02:48.090]从没想过你会给我如此感觉
[02:54.030]直到遇见你.才让我不再寻寻觅觅
[03:03.880]没有人像你那样了解我
[03:04.700]没有人像你那样了解我
